channel.title: Infinite amount of single item in shops? allstar source
channel.description: Hello, i've been having trouble trying to add an infinite amount of an item to a shop. For example, Bob's brilliant axes. I would like to have it so it's showing 1 in stock but is actually a never ending amount. Is there a way to do that? I know shops.cfg holds that information but not sure how i can do it. I have tried to use "-1" however, it was a failure. Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Infinite amount of single item in shops? allstar source
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

assuming your client has support for it already; writeDWord_v2(0);

Read full topic
item.source: Infinite amount of single item in shops? allstar source

item.title: Infinite amount of single item in shops? allstar source
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Donald8274:

I’d like to have it look nice instead of having thousands of the same item. I have it set that way at the moment but it just looks odd / not very appealing.

You edit the code in your shoppingmanager that when in the cfg file you stated - 1, it should display 1 and not substract any items from the shop when an item has been bought.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinite amount of single item in shops? allstar source

item.description:
@Donald8274 wrote:

Hello, i’ve been having trouble trying to add an infinite amount of an item to a shop. For example, Bob’s brilliant axes. I would like to have it so it’s showing 1 in stock but is actually a never ending amount. Is there a way to do that? I know shops.cfg holds that information but not sure how i can do it. I have tried to use “-1” however, it was a failure. Any help would be appreciated.
